mapper.select: select t.*,ua.appraise_detail,ua.appraise_level from (select ut.id,ut.categoryId,ut.category,ut.status,ut.desc,floor(ut.bonus) as bonus,floor(ut.maxbonus) as maxbonus,ut.finishTime,ut.appraise,ut.address,u.nickName as username,u.image as userimage,u1.nickName as workername,u1.image as workerimage from user_task ut,user1 u,user1 u1 where ut.userId=u.Id and ut.userId=u1.Id) t left join user_task_appraise ua on t.appraise=ua.id where t.address=#{code} and t.status=0 limit #{begin},#{pageSize}

select t.*,ua.appraise_detail,ua.appraise_level from (select ut.id,ut.categoryId,ut.category,ut.status,ut.desc,floor(ut.bonus) as bonus,floor(ut.maxbonus) as maxbonus,ut.finishTime,ut.appraise,ut.address,u.nickName as username,u.image as userimage,u1.nickName as workername,u1.image as workerimage from user_task ut,user1 u,user1 u1 where ut.userId=u.Id and ut.userId=u1.Id) t left join user_task_appraise ua on t.appraise=ua.id where t.address=#{code} and t.status=0 and t.categoryId = #{genreId} limit #{begin},#{pageSize}
